title: Zoe gets 3 TPs in a row from the minions
body:
TPs back to lane at level 3, uses her own TP to gank bot then TPs back to lane, then TPs back to lane at level 6.

Damn, sure got outplayed there.

replies.body: You're fault for not following your lane - league community 2017

You did.
She had to proactively use all those TPs efficiently.
Thats textbook outplay.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaddyFantome,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xa5qy0zo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-28T22:15:47.595+0000)
>
> You did.
> She had to proactively use all those TPs efficiently.
> Thats textbook outplay.

My troll senses are tingling

> [{quoted}](name=SpiritOfOdysseus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xa5qy0zo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-29T07:53:50.519+0000)
>
> My troll senses are tingling

{{champion:48}} senses

> [{quoted}](name=SpiritOfOdysseus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xa5qy0zo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-29T07:53:50.519+0000)
>
> My troll senses are tingling

..did uou not have a real reply?
Can you upload the replay?

> [{quoted}](name=CleverCactus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xa5qy0zo,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-11-29T03:18:40.525+0000)
>
> Can you upload the replay?

prolly made it up. Considering the fact that the majority of the games he went against a zoe, they had a bad KDA and none of the games did they carry. In fact the best Zoe game i saw out of 20+ was a 6/1 and the ezreal on her team clearly was the reason they lost with 13/2 KDA.

That has nothing to do with RNG. That's like saying Tryndamere's level 2 crit cheese is okay because he's underpowered in a theoretical meta where he is weak.

Extreme random bullshit is not okay just because it statistically averages out.

But it kinda is tho because why does 1/1000 games matter there are better things to whine about. Even then she only save herself the 30 seconds it takes to walk to lane twice because she already had tp so the bullshit is like 3-4 waves of cs which is annoying but it’s not like 20 cs is stronger than having an ability slot.

I mean something very similar happened to Scarra not even that long ago where he got I believe it was barrier twice in a row (once from the enemy mid laner, then it dropped from a minion), then he got tp...from a minion AFTER he killed the mid laner and just tp'd bot and got a kill.

So he got a barrier and tp how is that unfair? The Zoe had to use those things effectively and there could have been a situation where that tp was entirely useless so just because things workout doesn’t mean that’s op.

You aren't wrong. You can walk right back to lane with 0 gold and get a tp. What are you going to do with it? You have to hope your bot lane is tp'able in the next like 2 minutes because otherwise you simply don't have a W for that long since you can't just "replace" It since it must be used

> [{quoted}](name=My Waifu Vanilla,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xa5qy0zo,comment-id=0005000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-30T01:26:06.778+0000)
>
> You aren't wrong. You can walk right back to lane with 0 gold and get a tp. What are you going to do with it? You have to hope your bot lane is tp'able in the next like 2 minutes because otherwise you simply don't have a W for that long since you can't just "replace" It since it must be used

1 min. You can hold a spell for only 1 min before it fizzles outs
League of Legends is not poker, and it's not Hearthstone.
And? you have to have a point here

If she doesn't cs the minion, I don't think she gets the tp.

So if you harass her while she's going for the minion, you can make her pay for grabbing some of those tps.

> [{quoted}](name=chipndip1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xa5qy0zo,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-28T22:30:31.579+0000)
>
> If she doesn't cs the minion, I don't think she gets the tp.
> 
> So if you harass her while she's going for the minion, you can make her pay for grabbing some of those tps.

Can't only she see the minion?

I'm pretty sure I never noticed the minions holding balloons when vs. her.

Her balloons are there, for everyone in the game. 

I wonder how this will work in one for all, will there be 5 balloon minions in a wave, and will each zoe be able to get spells from her teammates balloons.
Everyone can see the minions (and the dropped spells on the ground).
Not to mention you have to pick up the shard which will likely be in a vulnerable spot.  Shards are worse than Klepto at getting Zoe killed.

I have seen them drop even when the minion was no where near here (ex when I was playing pantheon and I was top lane, one of the minions for some odd reason had the little icon that it would drop one a spell for her, and when the minion died to the other enemy minions the spell thing was available for her to pick up in that spot).
It might be a minor bug that allows her to pick it up if someone _else_ on her team kills them. If that's happening, though, that _is_ a bug.
That has to be a bug then because she's supposed to have to kill the minion to get the spell

> [{quoted}](name=chipndip1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xa5qy0zo,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-28T22:30:31.579+0000)
>
> If she doesn't cs the minion, I don't think she gets the tp.
> 
> So if you harass her while she's going for the minion, you can make her pay for grabbing some of those tps.

you do realize the enemy cant see which minions have the powers... only her team can...

https://youtu.be/HhwRz47Kk2Y?t=76
You have no idea  what she's going to get from the minion until she kills it. You might be putting yourself in a risky position just to deny her a Youmuu's.

Just had a game where I, as zoe, got 4 gunblade actives in a row. Some people get all the luck. 
{{sticker:cass-cry}}
Dam, league players sure hate rng. Have u tried just killing zoe? her early laning phase is hot garbage
If you think that's disgusting? Wait till you try to all in her but she gets 3 exhaust dropping from your and from minions while fighting her.
Mine got 2 redemptions in a row. She really outskilled me on this one by healing for half her HP while knocking away 20% of mine.
I doubt redemption healed that much considering it's base is hot garbage since its "rework".
It was level 5 so 110 x 2.5 and then a second one so 275 from each one, times 2 so 550 HP of her 810 max HP.
Except for reduction due to recently receiving.
True, what's the reduction? 50% less?

Sadly I checked, it IS a 50% reduction but unlike heal, the reduction last only 12 second not 35 seconds.

I did not know that, that's bullshxt.

Redemption's reduction needs to last the same 35 seconds like heal.
Then I'd have to check the replay because I think it was under 15 seconds but not sure.

Fine whatever its the equivalent of getting 1 TP in lane. Regardless what were you doing getting hit by 2 of them? If you take damage from Redemption not once, but twice, I really have no idea what to tell you since it is the slowest ability in the entire game and you got hit by it twice.
sleep bubble'd me under my tower and dropped it on me. Was funny the first time, annoying the second time.
only 20%? i had a lvl 2 zoe dive me bot lane and kill me with an e q
Her redemption isn't her E or Q
ik
Get rekt son
Reminder that Riot only hates RNG when its dodge.
Reminder that **CRIT** is also a form of RNG, yet nobody complains about it. "*Imagine someone critting you 5 times in a row with 5% crit chance, WOW this is disgusting and OP*"
They really need to address crit, it's the only input RNG bullshxt left that needs to be fixed.

There's difference between input and output rng.

One is accepted one is not, but they still havn't properly addressed crit yet.
Well you probably had a combat summoner and a combat w, while she had neither, so there is that.

> [{quoted}](name=Tenth Leper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xa5qy0zo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-28T22:17:44.472+0000)
>
> Well you probably had a combat summoner and a combat w, while she had neither, so there is that.

*COUGH* Zoe can take ignite just like you to have 2 ignites, and if you use your combat summ she now has your combat summ *COUGH*

Because someone thougth that having summoner spells in your W is not overpowered at all...

Just another CertainlyT champion.
Dam, league players sure hate rng. Have u tried just killing zoe? her early laning phase is hot garbage
